name: UniSub LLC
description: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
one_liner: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
industry: Blockchain, Crypto, FinTech, Gambling, Payments, SaaS, Web 3

name: YouStake, Inc.
description: Developer of an investment platform intended to facilitate sponsoring esports and poker players. The company offers a marketplace where fans can directly sponsor their favorite players in games such as poker and eSports competitions, while sharing the winnings, enabling users to invest in players easily, without administrative hassles.
one_liner: Developer of an investment platform intended to facilitate sponsoring esports and poker players. The company offers a marketplace where fans can directly sponsor their favorite players in games such as poker and eSports competitions, while sharing the winnings, enabling users to invest in players easily, without administrative hassles.

name: Amazegroup Inc
description: Provider of an eSports wagering service. The company provides a platform enabling users to game and put wagers on multiplayer online games such as 'Shadow Daggers,' 'League of Legends,' 'Call of Duty' and 'Starcraft 2.'
one_liner: Provider of an eSports wagering service. The company provides a platform enabling users to game and put wagers on multiplayer online games such as 'Shadow Daggers,' 'League of Legends,' 'Call of Duty' and 'Starcraft 2.'

name: AutoLotto, Inc.
description: Provider of mobile lottery services intended to help the lottery industry win over millennials. The company's mobile application Tap, tap, ticket, enables users to buy tickets from their smartphone and scan a paper ticket purchased in-store to track it and get notifications if they win, eliminating lost tickets and the need to track down results and ensuring safety and security by verifying user identity, location and age to provide the best and most-legitimate mobile lottery experience.
